question1: How old do you need to be for driver's license B?
answer1: You can take the practical exam as soon as you turn 18.
question2: Can you take driving lessons without theory?
answer2: It is not required to pass the theory exam before you can begin driving lessons at Liman Driving School.
question3: Can you drive with a provisional license?
answer3: Driving on the road begins after a practice period of up to 36 months, during which you have the choice of driving with a guide, or a period of 18 months without a guide.
question4: What if you took 20 hours of driving lessons?
answer4: After obtaining a "certificate of competency," you go to the town hall. There you can obtain your provisional M18 driving license through Liman Driving School, after which you can start driving independently.
